```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(rstan)
library(bayesplot)
library(bayesrules)
```

```{r}
lambda <- 2
lambda_prime <- 2.1

# a
min(1, (lambda_prime^(-2) * dnorm(lambda, mean = lambda_prime, sd = 1)) / 
      (lambda^(-2) * dnorm(lambda_prime, mean = lambda, sd = 1)))

# b
min(1, (exp(lambda_prime) * dnorm(lambda, mean = lambda_prime, sd = 0.2)) / 
      (exp(lambda) * dnorm(lambda_prime, mean = lambda, sd = 0.2)))

# c
min(1, (exp(-10 * lambda_prime) * dunif(lambda, min = lambda_prime - 0.5, max = lambda_prime + 0.5)) / 
      (exp(-10 * lambda) * dunif(lambda_prime, min = lambda - 0.5, max = lambda + 0.5)))

# d
min(1, (exp(-lambda_prime) * dexp(lambda, rate = 1 / lambda_prime)) / 
      (exp(-lambda) * dexp(lambda_prime, rate = 1 / lambda)))
```
